Text.Page:
Our measurement engineer requested soulstones, carried by nearby wraiths, to compare to fey focus found in the Timeless Woods. In doing so, she believes she can measure the extent of the contamination.

Please collect soulstones from the {@LinkCreature:28#3041#fallen wraiths} and take them to {@LinkCreature:228#1011$$Jurina}.

You got the soulstones from the fallen wraiths? Great!

I'll get to work on these right away.

Thanks!
Are you the one Harmelia sent to deliver the soulstones? Where are they?
